title: Zilean W should not be available level 1
body: Zilean's W ability (Reduce cooldown of other abilities by 10 seconds) should not be available level 1 since it is not functional without another ability already available.

Both of these scale in 50, but one is a buff to his early game and the other is just a nerf to his damage overall.
